T02D2322:264b-1: p'a da yo ga pra d'i pam na ma /
T02D2322:264b-3: rnal 'byor lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba /
T02D2322:264b-4: 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2322:264b-6: bstan pa slog pa'i lam mi 'jug / sdug bsngal thams cad zhi mdzad pa //
T02D2322:264b-7: dam pa skyes mchog de la 'dud //
T02D2322:264b-8: a'a li k'a li'i sgra don rtogs //
T02D2322:264b-9: sde snod gsum gyi don yang shes //
T02D2322:264b-10: bdag dang skye 'gro'i sems can rnams //
T02D2322:264b-11: ye nas skye med 'od gsal yang //
T02D2322:264b-12: ma rig pa yi rlung gis 'khrul //
T02D2322:264b-13: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong //
T02D2322:264b-14: de las grol bar byed pa'i phyir //
T02D2322:264b-16: sdig pa'i las rnams rab spangs te //
T02D2322:264b-17: dge ba'i chos la brtson par bya //
T02D2322:264b-18: bka' la som nyi mi za zhing //
T02D2322:264b-19: rtag tu skyabs 'gro ma nyams bya //
T02D2322:264b-20: byams pa'i sems dang rab ldan zhing //
T02D2322:264b-21: 'gro la snying rje ci nus bya //
T02D2322:264b-22: 'dod yon dngos po mi rtag pas //
T02D2322:264b-23: gzung 'dzin chags sems rnam par spangs //
T02D2322:264b-24: gzhan la smad par mi bya zhing //
T02D2322:264b-25: 'gro ba'i bla ma spyi bor bkur //
T02D2322:264b-26: log pa'i lam du mi 'jug cing //
T02D2322:264b-27: mthu dang ngan sngags spel mi bya //
T02D2322:264b-29: gcig pu nags su 'dug la bsgom //
T02D2322:264b-31: sangs dang snying po mdo yang brjod //
T02D2322:264b-32: yang na lkugs pa'i tshul du bsdad //
T02D2322:264b-33: rang byung dri ma med pa'i brda //
T02D2322:264b-34: lus la gru yi blo bzhag la //
T02D2322:264b-35: bcu len gyis ni zungs kyang bskyed //
T02D2322:265a-1: mo yis ni ro bsnyams te //
T02D2322:265a-2: 'byung ba bsnyams zhing nad rnams dbyung //
T02D2322:265a-3: gnod sbyin bar chad byed pa la //
T02D2322:265a-4: brtul zhugs gdams pa'i spyan pa bya //
T02D2322:265a-5: mi ngal gsum dang 'du ba gsum //
T02D2322:265a-6: 'khor lo gsum dang rtsa ba gsum //
T02D2322:265a-7: 'bar ba gsum dang chud mi za //
T02D2322:265a-8: thim pa gsum dang rgyas gdab bo //
T02D2322:265a-9: mdor na thams cad sems yin te //
T02D2322:265a-10: sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan med //
T02D2322:265a-12: blo las grol na gnyis su med //
T02D2322:265a-13: gnyug ma'i ngang las ma yengs par //
T02D2322:265a-14: dngos por snang ba sgyu mar blta //
T02D2322:265a-15: sgyu ma brdzun pa rmi lam tshul //
T02D2322:265a-16: rmi lam tshul sogs rab shes nas //
T02D2322:265a-17: dpe brgyad bzhin du shes par bya //
T02D2322:265a-18: rnal ma'i chos la rab gnas na //
T02D2322:265a-19: gang ltar spyad kyang bde ba thob //
T02D2322:265a-20: des na rnal 'byor brtson par bya //
T02D2322:265a-21: sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa rnal 'byor lam gyi
T02D2322:265a-22: sgron ma zhes bya ba rje btsun ka ma la
